Knave’s Gambit.name: Knave’s Gambit
Knave’s Gambit.flavor: You use superior positioning to make a decisive attack that assures a nasty wound to your foe, or that its counterattack strikes one of its allies rather than you.
Knave’s Gambit.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Knave’s Gambit.onMiss: The target must take a free action to make a melee basic attack against an enemy of yours that is adjacent to it. You choose the enemy.
Knave’s Gambit.artfulDodger: The target gains a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

Fool's Opportunity.name: Fool's Opportunity
Fool's Opportunity.flavor: You bait your foe into attacking you, and then turn his blow straight back at him.
Fool's Opportunity.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Fool's Opportunity.onHit: The target hits itself with its melee basic attack. (If you have combat advantage against the target and your Sneak Attack isn’t expended, you can use Sneak Attack against the target.)

Close Quarters.name: Close Quarters
Close Quarters.flavor: You take cover beneath a much larger creature, making it harder for the creature to hit you.
Close Quarters.prerequisite: You must have training in Acrobatics.
Close Quarters.effect: You move 1 square into the target’s space, provoking opportunity attacks as normal. While there, you have combat advantage against it, and it takes a -4 penalty to attack rolls against you. When the target moves, you move with it, staying in the same portion of its space. The target can take a standard action to make a Strength or a Dexterity vs. Reflex attack against you, without the -4 penalty. On a hit, the target slides you 1 square into an adjacent square, and this effect ends.

Blinding Barrage.name: Blinding Barrage
Blinding Barrage.flavor: A rapid flurry of projectiles leaves your enemies clearing the blood from their eyes.
Blinding Barrage.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Blinding Barrage.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast
Blinding Barrage.onHit: Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Feinting Flurry.name: Feinting Flurry
Feinting Flurry.flavor: A series of clever feints throws your foe off his game and makes it an easy target.
Feinting Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Feinting Flurry.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to all defenses against your attacks. The penalty equals your Charisma modifier.
Feinting Flurry.sustainMinor: The penalty persists until the end of your next turn.

Topple Over.name: Topple Over
Topple Over.flavor: Balance and momentum are your allies as you lunge forward, strike deftly, and knock your opponent to the ground.
Topple Over.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Topple Over.brutalScoundrel: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.
Topple Over.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Hamstring.name: Hamstring
Hamstring.flavor: You hobble your opponent with a ruthless slash across the legs, leaving it barely able to walk.
Hamstring.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Hamstring.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Hamstring.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).

Cloud Jump.name: Cloud Jump
Cloud Jump.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Cloud Jump.effect: You make two consecutive Athletics checks to jump, with a +5 power bonus to each check. You don’t have to land between the jumps, and the distance jumped isn’t limited by your speed.

Unbalancing Attack.name: Unbalancing Attack
Unbalancing Attack.flavor: Ducking and weaving, you land a decisive blow that staggers your foe and sets it up for a tripping attack.
Unbalancing Attack.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Unbalancing Attack.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn. If the target provokes an opportunity attack from you before the start of your next turn, you gain a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll of the opportunity attack equal to your Strength modifier, and you knock the target prone on a hit.

Slaying Strike.name: Slaying Strike
Slaying Strike.flavor: You look for an enemy near death, and then deliver a swift strike that will quickly end it.
Slaying Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Slaying Strike.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If the target is bloodied, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20.
Slaying Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage if the target is bloodied.

Imperiling Strike.name: Imperiling Strike
Imperiling Strike.flavor: You deal a staggering blow to your foe, opening a hole in its defenses.
Imperiling Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Imperiling Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -1 penalty to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.
Imperiling Strike.brutalScoundrel: The penalty to AC and Reflex equals your Strength modifier.

Nimble Climb.name: Nimble Climb
Nimble Climb.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Class Compendium
Nimble Climb.flavor: You climb surfaces with astounding ease.
Nimble Climb.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Nimble Climb.effect: You make an Athletics check to climb. If the check succeeds, you gain a +4 power bonus to your speed while climbing during this move.

Clever Riposte.name: Clever Riposte
Clever Riposte.flavor: You follow up a fierce attack with a series of quick, painful strikes woven between your enemy’s attacks.
Clever Riposte.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Clever Riposte.effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier immediately after attacking you, and you can shift 1 square as an immediate reaction after such an attack.

Trickster's Blade.name: Trickster's Blade
Trickster's Blade.flavor: You land an expert blow and follow up with a clever series of feints that bewilder your enemies.
Trickster's Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Trickster's Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain a bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier until the start of your next turn.

Hide from the Light.name: Hide from the Light
Hide from the Light.flavor: Until you choose to burst into action, you can move around the battlefield unseen.
Hide from the Light.prerequisite: You must have training in Stealth.
Hide from the Light.effect: You are invisible until the end of the encounter. The invisibility ends if you move more than 2 squares during your turn or make any attack other than a basic attack or an at-will attack.

Riposte Strike.name: Riposte Strike
Riposte Strike.flavor: With a calculated strike, you leave your foe vulnerable to an adroit riposte if it dares to attack you.
Riposte Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Riposte Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target attacks you before the start of your next turn and it is within reach, you can make a Strength vs. AC attack against it as an immediate interrupt. On a hit, the target takes 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage and 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Spring the Trap.name: Spring the Trap
Spring the Trap.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Spring the Trap.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Spring the Trap.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square.
Spring the Trap.ruthlessRuffian: This power gains the rattling keyword.

Piercing Strike.name: Piercing Strike
Piercing Strike.flavor: You drive your weapon past your foe’s guard and into a tender spot.
Piercing Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Piercing Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Sly Flourish.name: Sly Flourish
Sly Flourish.flavor: You use a distracting flourish with your off hand to land a solid blow.
Sly Flourish.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Sly Flourish.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier + Charisma modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier + Charisma modifier damage.

Deft Strike.name: Deft Strike
Deft Strike.flavor: A final lunge brings you into an advantageous position.
Deft Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Deft Strike.effect: Before the attack, you can move up to 2 squares.
Deft Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Sand in the Eyes.name: Sand in the Eyes
Sand in the Eyes.flavor: You scoop up a handful of sand or dirt or pebbles, strike your foe, and throw the grit in its face to blind it.
Sand in the Eyes.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Sand in the Eyes.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Deep Cut.name: Deep Cut
Deep Cut.flavor: You strike your enemy, delivering a deep, bleeding wound.
Deep Cut.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Deep Cut.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier (save ends).

Rogue's Luck.name: Rogue's Luck
Rogue's Luck.flavor: You turn a failed initial attack into a successful counterattack.
Rogue's Luck.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Rogue's Luck.onMiss: Make the secondary attack against the target.
Rogue's Luck.artfulDodger: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Stunning Strike.name: Stunning Strike
Stunning Strike.flavor: A well-timed attack leaves your enemy flailing helplessly for a few critical seconds.
Stunning Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Stunning Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Tornado Strike.name: Tornado Strike
Tornado Strike.flavor: Your weapon becomes a blur as you make swift, sweeping attacks against a pair of foes that moves them out of position.
Tornado Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Tornado Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target up to 2 squares.
Tornado Strike.artfulDodger: The distance of the slide can be up to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
Tornado Strike.effect: After the attack, you move up to 3 squares.

Dragon Tail Strike.name: Dragon Tail Strike
Dragon Tail Strike.flavor: First you set them up, and then you knock them down.
Dragon Tail Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Dragon Tail Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target hits or misses you with an attack before the start of your next turn, you can repeat the attack against it as an immediate interrupt, dealing 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage on a hit.
Dragon Tail Strike.brutalScoundrel: You gain a bonus to the attack roll of the immediate interrupt. The bonus equals your Strength modifier.

Steel Entrapment.name: Steel Entrapment
Steel Entrapment.flavor: A few quick, well-aimed attacks momentarily pin your foes in place.
Steel Entrapment.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Steel Entrapment.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast
Steel Entrapment.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Scorpion Strike.name: Scorpion Strike
Scorpion Strike.flavor: One of your allies deals a timely blow to your enemy, and like a scorpion, you take advantage of the opening to strike.
Scorpion Strike.trigger: An ally damages a creature adjacent to you
Scorpion Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Scorpion Strike.brutalScoundrel: Whether or not the attack hits, you shift a number of squares up to your Strength modifier.

Perfect Strike.name: Perfect Strike
Perfect Strike.flavor: Watching your foe’s movements, you time your attack perfectly, knowing exactly where and how to strike to do the most harm.
Perfect Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Perfect Strike.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, Fortitude, Reflex. You make one attack roll. If it hits at least one of the three defenses, the attack hits.
Perfect Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if the attack hits at least two defenses. If the attack hits all three defenses, the target is also stunned until the end of your next turn.

Dance of Death.name: Dance of Death
Dance of Death.flavor: You duck and dodge your enemies’ attacks, striking as opportunity allows while expertly deflecting attacks made against you.
Dance of Death.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Dance of Death.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Dance of Death.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target makes a melee attack against you before the end of your next turn, you can have it attack another creature of your choice, including itself, instead of you.
Dance of Death.artfulDodger: The target gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

Walking Wounded.name: Walking Wounded
Walking Wounded.flavor: You topple your enemy with a crippling blow, leaving it to stumble around the battlefield.
Walking Wounded.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Walking Wounded.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Until the end of the encounter, if the target moves more than half its speed with a single action on its turn, it falls prone at the end of the move.

Knockout.name: Knockout
Knockout.flavor: A well-placed blow takes your foe out of the fight.
Knockout.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Knockout.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target falls unconscious (save ends). If the unconscious target takes any damage, this unconsciousness ends.
Knockout.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Bloody Path.name: Bloody Path
Bloody Path.flavor: You dash across the battlefield, leaving bewildered and bleeding enemies in your wake.
Bloody Path.effect: You move up to your speed. Any enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you as a result of this movement must do so, but it makes the opportunity attack against itself instead of against you.

Garrote Grip.name: Garrote Grip
Garrote Grip.flavor: You put your foe into a hold that will soon take it out of the fight.
Garrote Grip.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade and have a hand free.
Garrote Grip.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you grab the target until the end of your next turn. Until the grab ends, you have partial cover, and any melee attack or ranged attack that misses you hits the target instead.
Garrote Grip.sustainMinor: The grab persists until the end of your next turn. The third time you sustain the grab, the target falls unconscious. If the unconscious target takes any damage, the unconsciousness ends.
Garrote Grip.special: You can use this power as a minor action if you are grabbing a creature, and you automatically hit that creature.

Flying Foe.name: Flying Foe
Flying Foe.flavor: As soon as your foe is off-balance, you deliver a powerful strike, then easily shove it where you want it to go.
Flying Foe.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Flying Foe.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares up to your Strength modifier. If you end the slide with the target adjacent to one or more objects or creatures, you can cause both the target and one of those objects or creatures to take 10 damage.
Flying Foe.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target a number of squares up to your Strength modifier.

Deadly Positioning.name: Deadly Positioning
Deadly Positioning.flavor: You adroitly outmaneuver your enemy, baiting it with every stride and strike.
Deadly Positioning.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Deadly Positioning.attack: You slide the target up to 3 squares to a different square adjacent to you, and then make a Dexterity vs. AC attack against it.
Deadly Positioning.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you are adjacent to the target, you can slide the target 1 square before making a melee attack against it.

Fleeting Ghost.name: Fleeting Ghost
Fleeting Ghost.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Class Compendium
Fleeting Ghost.flavor: You are stealthy and fleet of foot at the same time.
Fleeting Ghost.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
Fleeting Ghost.effect: You move up to your speed and can make a Stealth check to hide. You take no penalty to the Stealth check for the movement, though you must still meet the normal requirements to hide.

Great Leap.name: Great Leap
Great Leap.flavor: You leap a great distance without a running start.
Great Leap.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Great Leap.effect: You make an Athletics check to jump. You are considered to have a running start, and the distance of the jump isn’t limited by your speed.

Master of Deceit.name: Master of Deceit
Master of Deceit.flavor: The line between truth and deception is thin, and you cross it with ease.
Master of Deceit.prerequisite: You must have training in Bluff.
Master of Deceit.trigger: You make a Bluff check and dislike the result.
Master of Deceit.effect: You reroll the Bluff check and must use the second result.

Ignoble Escape.name: Ignoble Escape
Ignoble Escape.flavor: With nimble ease, you sidestep one perilous situation after another, ignoring any who challenge you.
Ignoble Escape.prerequisite: You must have training in Acrobatics.
Ignoble Escape.effect: If you are marked, that condition ends on you. You can shift up to your speed.

Slippery Mind.name: Slippery Mind
Slippery Mind.flavor: You cloud your mind with vague thoughts that shield you against a sudden mental attack.
Slippery Mind.prerequisite: You must have training in Bluff.
Slippery Mind.trigger: You are hit by an attack against your Will.
Slippery Mind.effect: Gain a +2 power bonus to Will against the triggering attack.

Leaping Dodge.name: Leaping Dodge
Leaping Dodge.flavor: You leap out of harm’s way just in time to avoid an attack.
Leaping Dodge.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Leaping Dodge.trigger: An enemy targets you with an attack.
Leaping Dodge.effect: You jump, making an Athletics check with a +5 power bonus.

Raise the Stakes.name: Raise the Stakes
Raise the Stakes.flavor: You focus on bringing your foe down quickly at the expense of your own safety.
Raise the Stakes.prerequisite: You must have training in Bluff.
Raise the Stakes.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20, and any attack against you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.

Hide in Plain Sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
Hide in Plain Sight.flavor: You stand unseen in the midst of the battle, striking from your place of hiding.
Hide in Plain Sight.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
Hide in Plain Sight.effect: You are invisible until you leave your current space or until the end of the encounter. No other action that you perform makes you visible.

Dazing Strike.name: Dazing Strike
Dazing Strike.flavor: An expert strike catches your foe by surprise and leaves it reeling from the pain.
Dazing Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Dazing Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Torturous Strike.name: Torturous Strike
Torturous Strike.flavor: You wrench your weapon just so, making your enemy howl in pain.
Torturous Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Torturous Strike.brutalScoundrel: You gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Strength modifier.

Setup Strike.name: Setup Strike
Setup Strike.flavor: You land a calculated blow that causes your enemy to drop its guard, leaving it vulnerable to subsequent attacks.
Setup Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Setup Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target grants you combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Quick Fingers.name: Quick Fingers
Quick Fingers.flavor: You can pilfer a coin pouch in the blink of an eye.
Quick Fingers.prerequisite: You must have training in Thievery.
Quick Fingers.effect: You make a Thievery check as part of this action, even if the check is normally a standard action.

Tumble.name: Tumble
Tumble.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Class Compendium
Tumble.flavor: You dodge and tumble past your foes with such speed and precision that they are unable to react.
Tumble.prerequisite: You must have training in Acrobatics.
Tumble.effect: You shift up to your speed.

Shadow Stride.name: Shadow Stride
Shadow Stride.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Class Compendium
Shadow Stride.flavor: You silently step from shadow to shadow, slipping past your foes unseen and unheard.
Shadow Stride.prerequisite: You must have training in Stealth.
Shadow Stride.effect: Make a Stealth check and then move up to your speed to a square where you have cover or concealment. You take no penalty to the check if you move more than 2 squares. Unless the check fails to beat an enemy’s passive Perception, you remain hidden during the move, even if you have no cover or concealment during it.

Mob Mentality.name: Mob Mentality
Mob Mentality.flavor: When it comes to lying, cajoling, or persuading others, your allies follow your lead.
Mob Mentality.prerequisite: You must have training in Intimidate.
Mob Mentality.targets: You and each ally in the burst
Mob Mentality.effect: Each target gains a +2 power bonus to Charisma-based skill checks and ability checks until the end of your next turn.

Painful Shot.name: Painful Shot
Painful Shot.flavor: You hit your foe in a vital spot, causing it to reel in pain.
Painful Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Painful Shot.cunningSneak: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Easy Target.name: Easy Target
Easy Target.flavor: You deal a staggering blow to your enemy, setting it up for future attacks.
Easy Target.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Easy Target.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).
Easy Target.onMiss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Seize the Moment.name: Seize the Moment
Seize the Moment.flavor: It’s time to make your move.
Seize the Moment.trigger: You make an initiative check at the beginning of an encounter
Seize the Moment.effect: You gain a +20 bonus to your initiative check. Until the end of your first turn in the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to speed.

Crimson Edge.name: Crimson Edge
Crimson Edge.flavor: You deal your enemy a vicious wound that continues to bleed, and then wait for your opportunity as it weakens.
Crimson Edge.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Crimson Edge.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you and takes ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier (save ends both).

Bait and Switch.name: Bait and Switch
Bait and Switch.flavor: You strike and weave, causing your foe to lurch forward and allowing you to move to where it was standing.
Bait and Switch.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Bait and Switch.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. In addition, you swap places with the target, sliding it 1 square and shifting 1 square. You can then shift 1 square.
Bait and Switch.artfulDodger: The distance of the second shift can be up to your Charisma modifier.

Cloud of Steel.name: Cloud of Steel
Cloud of Steel.flavor: You shower your enemies with a host of projectiles.
Cloud of Steel.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Cloud of Steel.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast

King's Castle.name: King's Castle
King's Castle.flavor: You make a stinging strike against your foe and then retreat behind a nearby ally.
King's Castle.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
King's Castle.effect: You and an adjacent ally can swap places (the ally slides 1 square, and you shift 1 square).

Positioning Strike.name: Positioning Strike
Positioning Strike.flavor: A false stumble and a shove place the enemy exactly where you want it.
Positioning Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Positioning Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.
Positioning Strike.artfulDodger: The distance of the slide can be up to your Charisma modifier.

Stab and Grab.name: Stab and Grab
Stab and Grab.flavor: You grab your foe with one hand and deliver a quick, deadly jab with the other.
Stab and Grab.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade and have a hand free.
Stab and Grab.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you grab the target until the end of your next turn. If you already have the target grabbed, it is restrained until the grab ends (it can still try to escape).
Stab and Grab.sustainMinor: The grab persists until the end of your next turn.

Hounding Strike.name: Hounding Strike
Hounding Strike.flavor: You deliver a ferocious strike that puts doubt into enemy of its chances of living.
Hounding Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Hounding Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, you have combat advantage against the target and gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses against its attacks.
Hounding Strike.artfulDodger: The power bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

Trick Strike.name: Trick Strike
Trick Strike.flavor: Through a series of feints and lures, you maneuver your foe right where you want it.
Trick Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Trick Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.
Trick Strike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can slide the target 1 square whenever you hit it.

Assassin's Point.name: Assassin's Point
Assassin's Point.flavor: You wait for the perfect moment to slay your foe, delivering a lethal strike when its defenses are down for but a moment.
Assassin's Point.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Assassin's Point.special: If you have combat advantage against the target, double any extra damage from Sneak Attack or a critical hit.

Immobilizing Strike.name: Immobilizing Strike
Immobilizing Strike.flavor: With terrifying ease, you slash at your enemy’s legs, leaving it whimpering in pain.
Immobilizing Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Immobilizing Strike.onHit: 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Immobilizing Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Immobilizing Strike.effect: The target takes a -5 penalty to saving throws against this power’s effects.

Snake’s Retreat.name: Snake’s Retreat
Snake’s Retreat.flavor: After striking boldly, you thwart your foe by shifting away just as it’s about to attack you.
Snake’s Retreat.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Snake’s Retreat.effect: The target is frustrated by you (save ends). Until this effect ends, you can shift 1 square as an immediate interrupt when the target makes a melee or a ranged attack against you.

Ghost on the Wind.name: Ghost on the Wind
Ghost on the Wind.flavor: You vanish from your foe’s sight, only to appear out of nowhere and strike a devastating blow.
Ghost on the Wind.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Ghost on the Wind.onHit: 6[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you have combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn. You become invisible, and you shift up to 5 squares to a square adjacent to the target. You reappear at the start of your next turn.
Ghost on the Wind.onMiss: Half damage, and you have combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn. You can shift 1 square to a square adjacent to the target.

Moving Target.name: Moving Target
Moving Target.flavor: You direct an attack meant for you to another enemy.
Moving Target.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Moving Target.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee or a ranged attack.
Moving Target.onHit: The attack hits a creature of your choice within 2 squares of you, instead of hitting you.
Moving Target.onMiss: The target’s attack deals only half damage to you.

Chameleon.name: Chameleon
Chameleon.prerequisite: You must have training in Stealth.
Chameleon.trigger: You are hidden and lose cover or concealment against an enemy.
Chameleon.effect: You make a Stealth check. If your check beats the triggering enemy’s passive Perception, you remain hidden from it, and until the end of your next turn you can remain hidden from it without needing any cover or concealment.

Dangerous Theft.name: Dangerous Theft
Dangerous Theft.flavor: You boldly snatch an item from an enemy.
Dangerous Theft.prerequisite: You must have training in Thievery.
Dangerous Theft.effect: On your next action, ignore the -10 penalty when you make a Thievery check to pick a pocket during combat.

Foil the Lock.name: Foil the Lock
Foil the Lock.flavor: You tug on a lock a certain way, and just like that, it snaps open.
Foil the Lock.prerequisite: You must have training in Thievery.
Foil the Lock.effect: On your next action, you gain a +10 power bonus when you make a Thievery check to open a lock. If the check succeeds, the lock opens at once.

Certain Freedom.name: Certain Freedom
Certain Freedom.flavor: You are as slippery as an eel.
Certain Freedom.prerequisite: You must have training in Acrobatics.
Certain Freedom.effect: You automatically succeed on an Acrobatics check to escape from a grab or from restraints.

Dazzling Acrobatics.name: Dazzling Acrobatics
Dazzling Acrobatics.flavor: With quick leaps and bold spins, you slip away from a foe’s attack.
Dazzling Acrobatics.prerequisite: You must have training in Acrobatics.
Dazzling Acrobatics.effect: You shift up to twice your speed. During the shift, you gain a +4 bonus to AC and can climb at full speed.

Biting Assault.name: Biting Assault
Biting Assault.flavor: You strike with deadly ferocity, hitting your foe in places that will hinder it and cause the greatest pain.
Biting Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Biting Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is weakened and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Biting Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Hurricane of Blood.name: Hurricane of Blood
Hurricane of Blood.flavor: You stab and slash your foe mercilessly, getting in close so your enemy has a hard time avoiding your attacks.
Hurricane of Blood.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hurricane of Blood.brutalScoundrel: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.

Disheartening Strike.name: Disheartening Strike
Disheartening Strike.flavor: The bite of your weapon is deepened by the sting of your ire.
Disheartening Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Disheartening Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.

Blade Vault.name: Blade Vault
Blade Vault.flavor: You bound into the air, driving your blade home as you land.
Blade Vault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Blade Vault.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 2 squares. If you are trained in Athletics, ignore difficult terrain during the shift.
Blade Vault.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. For every square you shifted as part of this power, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Termination Threat.name: Termination Threat
Termination Threat.flavor: Your attack unnerves your foe, possibly freezing it in its tracks.
Termination Threat.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Termination Threat.ruthlessRuffian: If the target is already taking the attack penalty from one of your rattling attacks, the target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Handspring Assault.name: Handspring Assault
Handspring Assault.flavor: Springing forward with feline agility, you lash out, cut deep, and roll away to safety.
Handspring Assault.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Handspring Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Handspring Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 2 squares.
Handspring Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Flashy Riposte.name: Flashy Riposte
Flashy Riposte.flavor: Under attack, you elegantly whirl and let your blade give a sharp reply, leaving your foe off balance.
Flashy Riposte.trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against you
Flashy Riposte.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Flashy Riposte.effect: The target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Snap Shot.name: Snap Shot
Snap Shot.flavor: You strike as quickly as a coiled viper.
Snap Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.

Enforced Threat.name: Enforced Threat
Enforced Threat.flavor: Your weapon backs up your threats, extracting its toll in blood.
Enforced Threat.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Enforced Threat.ruthlessRuffian: If the target is taking the attack penalty from one of your rattling attacks, you gain combat advantage against the target for this attack.

Vigilant Footwork.name: Vigilant Footwork
Vigilant Footwork.flavor: You parry and dodge close-quarters attacks with amazing focus, never hampering your offense.
Vigilant Footwork.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Vigilant Footwork.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 power bonus to AC and Reflex against melee attacks.

Compel the Craven.name: Compel the Craven
Compel the Craven.flavor: Your unnerving attack forces your foe to run away from you, heedless of its enemies.
Compel the Craven.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Compel the Craven.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target moves away from you a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier, avoiding unsafe squares and difficult terrain if it can.
Compel the Craven.onMiss: The target moves 1 square away from you, avoiding unsafe squares and difficult terrain if it can.

Ferret Out Frailty.name: Ferret Out Frailty
Ferret Out Frailty.flavor: You can always spot easy prey.
Ferret Out Frailty.prerequisite: You must be trained in Insight.
Ferret Out Frailty.effect: Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain combat advantage against one target within line of sight. If the target is taking the attack penalty from one of your rattling attacks, you instead gain combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Circling Predator.name: Circling Predator
Circling Predator.flavor: You wheel around your foe, attacking mercilessly.
Circling Predator.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Circling Predator.effect: You can shift 1 square and must end adjacent to the target. Then make a secondary attack against it.
Circling Predator.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.

Strong-Arm Loyalty.name: Strong-Arm Loyalty
Strong-Arm Loyalty.flavor: You browbeat your wounded foe with a cruel attack, forcing compliance for a short time.
Strong-Arm Loyalty.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Strong-Arm Loyalty.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Strong-Arm Loyalty.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dominated until the start of your next turn or until it is attacked.
Strong-Arm Loyalty.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the start of your next turn or until it is attacked.

Combat Tumbleset.name: Combat Tumbleset
Combat Tumbleset.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Combat Tumbleset.effect: You can shift your speed and can shift through squares occupied by enemies during this movement.

Peripheral Concealment.name: Peripheral Concealment
Peripheral Concealment.flavor: You slip away, and others briefly lose track of where you are.
Peripheral Concealment.prerequisite: You must be trained in Stealth.
Peripheral Concealment.requirement: No creature is within 3 squares of you.
Peripheral Concealment.effect: You become hidden until you attack or until the end of your next turn.

Bounding Escape.name: Bounding Escape
Bounding Escape.flavor: You attack and then jump away from your foe without leaving yourself open to counterattack.
Bounding Escape.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Bounding Escape.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Bounding Escape.effect: You can jump horizontally a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier or jump vertically half that number of squares. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target.
Bounding Escape.artfulDodger: This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from any enemy.

Toppling Slash.name: Toppling Slash
Toppling Slash.flavor: Your decisive cut forces your opponent to stumble and fall.
Toppling Slash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Toppling Slash.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Toppling Slash.brutalScoundrel: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier, and you push the target 1 extra square.

Magpie Filch.name: Magpie Filch
Magpie Filch.flavor: You covertly snatch something from a foe distracted by your successful attack.
Magpie Filch.trigger: You hit a creature with a melee attack
Magpie Filch.prerequisite: You must be trained in Thievery.
Magpie Filch.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Magpie Filch.effect: You take a small object from the target as if you had made a successful Thievery check to pick pocket.

Mind-Boggling Onslaught.name: Mind-Boggling Onslaught
Mind-Boggling Onslaught.flavor: Your fearsome attack shakes your enemy to the core—a situation you can later take advantage of.
Mind-Boggling Onslaught.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Mind-Boggling Onslaught.effect: Whether or not this rattling attack deals damage, the target takes the –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Mind-Boggling Onslaught.sustainMinor: The penalty to attack rolls lasts until the end of your next turn, or you can end the penalty and daze the target until the end of your next turn.

Grasshopper Leap.name: Grasshopper Leap
Grasshopper Leap.flavor: You jump, covering a jaw-dropping distance.
Grasshopper Leap.trigger: You make an Athletics check to jump
Grasshopper Leap.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Grasshopper Leap.effect: Treat the Athletics check as if you had rolled a 20.

Opportunistic Relocation.name: Opportunistic Relocation
Opportunistic Relocation.flavor: You capitalize on the distraction caused by downing a foe, slyly repositioning for your next maneuver.
Opportunistic Relocation.requirement: You must have reduced an enemy to 0 hit points during this turn.

Guerrilla Blitz.name: Guerrilla Blitz
Guerrilla Blitz.flavor: The speed and accuracy displayed during your daring assault causes your enemies to momentarily overcompensate when attacking you.
Guerrilla Blitz.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Guerrilla Blitz.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 power bonus to AC and Reflex for every 2 squares you moved as part of this power.
Guerrilla Blitz.brutalScoundrel: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Stinging Squall.name: Stinging Squall
Stinging Squall.flavor: Spooked by your flurry of jabs, nearby adversaries are unable to make anything but feeble retaliatory strikes against you.
Stinging Squall.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Stinging Squall.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Stinging Squall.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is weakened when making attacks against you until the end of your next turn.
Stinging Squall.ruthlessRuffian: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier, and the target is weakened when making any attack (not just against you).

Wall Crawl.name: Wall Crawl
Wall Crawl.flavor: You scramble upward with preternatural speed.
Wall Crawl.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics and Athletics.
Wall Crawl.effect: You climb a number of squares equal to your speed minus your armor’s check penalty.

Blindside.name: Blindside
Blindside.flavor: Your attack comes from such an unexpected angle that your adversary is taken aback.
Blindside.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Blindside.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and if you have combat advantage against the target, it is dazed until the start of your next turn.

Gory Slash.name: Gory Slash
Gory Slash.flavor: Your bladed savagery opens a gushing wound that cripples your foe with pain.
Gory Slash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Gory Slash.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and is immobilized (save ends both).
Gory Slash.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends). The target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.

Felling Gash.name: Felling Gash
Felling Gash.flavor: You cut the legs out from under your foe so brutally that its head hits the ground before its feet do.
Felling Gash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Felling Gash.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Felling Gash.ruthlessRuffian: The target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Acrobatic Assault.name: Acrobatic Assault
Acrobatic Assault.flavor: With tumbling lunges, you deliver a sharp blow to each nearby enemy and return to your starting position.
Acrobatic Assault.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Acrobatic Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Acrobatic Assault.effect: You can shift 4 squares and repeat the attack against a second target. You can then shift 4 squares and repeat the attack against a third target.

A Murder of One.name: A Murder of One
A Murder of One.flavor: You flip and flit, stab and slash, as if flying among your foes.
A Murder of One.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
A Murder of One.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
A Murder of One.effect: You can shift 3 squares and can shift through squares occupied by enemies during this movement. Make a secondary attack.
A Murder of One.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
A Murder of One.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the primary or the secondary attack hit, this attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
A Murder of One.secondaryeffect: You can shift 3 squares and can shift through squares occupied by enemies during this movement. Make a tertiary attack.
A Murder of One.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets

Stupefying Violence.name: Stupefying Violence
Stupefying Violence.flavor: Your enemy reels from your shocking belligerence.
Stupefying Violence.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Stupefying Violence.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Stupefying Violence.ruthlessRuffian: You instead slide the target a number of squares equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier.

Cagey Killer.name: Cagey Killer
Cagey Killer.flavor: You smile and flick your weapon; your enemy stares unmoving at the deep wound.
Cagey Killer.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling
Cagey Killer.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Cagey Killer.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Reap the Rattled.name: Reap the Rattled
Reap the Rattled.flavor: Rattled foes are ripe fodder for your attacks.
Reap the Rattled.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Reap the Rattled.effect: Select an enemy within line of sight that is taking the penalty from one of your rattling attacks. You gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Not Worth My Time.name: Not Worth My Time
Not Worth My Time.flavor: With a vicious blow and a callous shove, you judge your foe unworthy of further attention.
Not Worth My Time.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Not Worth My Time.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is then immobilized (save ends).
Not Worth My Time.onMiss: Half damage, no push, and the target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Double Take.name: Double Take
Double Take.flavor: Suspecting something is hidden, you concentrate your will on spotting it.
Double Take.prerequisite: You must be trained in Perception.
Double Take.effect: Make a Perception check with a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.

Unnerving Footwork.name: Unnerving Footwork
Unnerving Footwork.flavor: Your amazing footwork shows you to be a superior combatant, disheartening enemies that draw near.
Unnerving Footwork.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Unnerving Footwork.effect: Until the stance ends, any creature that ends its turn adjacent to you takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of its next turn.

Scoundrel’s Epiphany.name: Scoundrel’s Epiphany
Scoundrel’s Epiphany.flavor: The answer is on the tip of your tongue.
Scoundrel’s Epiphany.trigger: You make a Dungeoneering or a Streetwise check to remember or discover a useful bit of information
Scoundrel’s Epiphany.prerequisite: You must be trained in Dungeoneering or Streetwise.
Scoundrel’s Epiphany.effect: If you are trained in the skill, don’t roll for the check; you are considered to have rolled a 25 and then add your skill check bonus. If you are not trained in the skill, you gain a +5 bonus to the check.

Fox's Gambit.name: Fox's Gambit
Fox's Gambit.flavor: A distracting stab is all you need to foil your enemy's focus and make a quick dash to a better position.
Fox's Gambit.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Fox's Gambit.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Fox's Gambit.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you negate any marks the target has applied. The target cannot mark any targets until the end of your next turn.
Fox's Gambit.artfulDodger: You can instead shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Sly Lunge.name: Sly Lunge
Sly Lunge.flavor: You dart in to take advantage of lax defenses, and after striking, you’re ready to capitalize on the same opening again.
Sly Lunge.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Sly Lunge.target: One creature granting combat advantage to you
Sly Lunge.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn. If you don’t apply your Sneak Attack damage to this attack, it deals 1d6 extra damage.
Sly Lunge.brutalScoundrel: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Defender's Cohort.name: Defender's Cohort
Defender's Cohort.flavor: Another warrior’s vigilance is all you need to find the soft spot in your enemy’s defenses.
Defender's Cohort.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Defender's Cohort.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target is marked by an ally of yours, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

Cunning Cyclone.name: Cunning Cyclone
Cunning Cyclone.flavor: A series of lightning-fast attacks does devastating work to your opponents.
Cunning Cyclone.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Cunning Cyclone.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Cunning Cyclone.special: If you have combat advantage against more than one target, you can deal one die of Sneak Attack damage to each target that you have combat advantage against, rather than dealing all your Sneak Attack damage to one target. This counts as one use of Sneak Attack, regardless of the number of targets.

Escape Artist's Gambit.name: Escape Artist's Gambit
Escape Artist's Gambit.flavor: You take a parting shot as you wriggle free and scramble away.
Escape Artist's Gambit.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Escape Artist's Gambit.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. If you are immobilized, slowed, or both, those conditions end before you shift, and you automatically escape if you are grabbed.
Escape Artist's Gambit.artfulDodger: You can instead shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier.

Stunning Assist.name: Stunning Assist
Stunning Assist.flavor: The fighter distracts him, and you shut him down.
Stunning Assist.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling
Stunning Assist.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If the target is marked by any of your allies, it is stunned instead of dazed.

Confounding Attack.name: Confounding Attack
Confounding Attack.flavor: Your attack causes your opponent to accidentally wallop his ally.
Confounding Attack.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Confounding Attack.effect: As a free action, the target makes a melee basic attack against a creature of your choice adjacent to it. If you or the target has combat advantage against the creature and you haven’t dealt your Sneak Attack damage during this round, you can deal your Sneak Attack damage against the creature.

Downward Spiral.name: Downward Spiral
Downward Spiral.flavor: You spin about with your weapon, toppling your enemies.
Downward Spiral.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Downward Spiral.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Ripple Effect.name: Ripple Effect
Ripple Effect.flavor: Your tumbling swipe sends your foe headlong into another enemy, which sends it stumbling.
Ripple Effect.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Ripple Effect.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Ripple Effect.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the primary target 4 squares.
Ripple Effect.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the primary target 1 square.
Ripple Effect.effect: Make a secondary attack after the slide.
Ripple Effect.secondaryTarget: One enemy adjacent to the primary target
Ripple Effect.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the secondary target 1 square.

No Escape.name: No Escape
No Escape.flavor: Your enemy tries to escape, but you leave it lying in its tracks.
No Escape.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to you or enters a square where it has cover or concealment against you
No Escape.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
No Escape.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Swift Strike.name: Swift Strike
Swift Strike.flavor: Your brutal efficiency makes your enemy pay for its lack of initiative.
Swift Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Swift Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target has not taken an action during this encounter, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

Guarded Attack.name: Guarded Attack
Guarded Attack.flavor: Striking quickly, you remain ready to parry.
Guarded Attack.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Guarded Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and if the target makes a melee attack against you before the start of your next turn, you can make a secondary attack against it as an immediate interrupt.
Guarded Attack.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to the triggering attack roll.

Impact Shot.name: Impact Shot
Impact Shot.flavor: Your shot slams your foe backward.
Impact Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Impact Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Unbalancing Shot.name: Unbalancing Shot
Unbalancing Shot.flavor: The impact of your shot leaves your enemy wobbly.
Unbalancing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Unbalancing Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Pommel Smash.name: Pommel Smash
Pommel Smash.flavor: You pound the pommel of your blade into your enemy’s face.
Pommel Smash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Pommel Smash.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Pommel Smash.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Precise Incision.name: Precise Incision
Precise Incision.flavor: You target an opening in your foe’s armor and make a vicious cut.
Precise Incision.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.

Press the Advantage.name: Press the Advantage
Press the Advantage.flavor: Having just wounded your opponent, you follow up with a finishing move.
Press the Advantage.trigger: You bloody an enemy with a melee attack
Press the Advantage.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.

Adaptable Flanker.name: Adaptable Flanker
Adaptable Flanker.flavor: The mere presence of an ally gives you all the advantage you need.
Adaptable Flanker.requirement: You and an ally must be adjacent to the same enemy.
Adaptable Flanker.effect: You gain combat advantage against the enemy until the start of your next turn.

Hop up.name: Hop up
Hop up.flavor: Rolling with a blow that knocked you down, you hop up just a few steps away.
Hop up.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Hop up.effect: You stand up and can shift 1 square.

Sneak in the Attack.name: Sneak in the Attack
Sneak in the Attack.flavor: You give your ally the advantage she needs to inflict a devastating attack.
Sneak in the Attack.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the next ally who hits the target and has combat advantage against it deals extra damage against it equal to your Sneak Attack damage.

Flamboyant Strike.name: Flamboyant Strike
Flamboyant Strike.flavor: By distracting your foe with a colorful flourish, you manage to attack from an unexpected angle.
Flamboyant Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.

Low Slash.name: Low Slash
Low Slash.flavor: Your blade bites your enemy’s legs, momentarily hobbling him.
Low Slash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Low Slash.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, you slide the target 1 square, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. If you’re flanking the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier or Charisma modifier.

Nasty Backswing.name: Nasty Backswing
Nasty Backswing.flavor: You follow a missed attack with a surprising strike and a hasty sidestep.
Nasty Backswing.trigger: You miss with a melee attack
Nasty Backswing.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Nasty Backswing.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. You have combat advantage for this attack.
Nasty Backswing.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square.
Nasty Backswing.brutalScoundrel: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Driving Assault.name: Driving Assault
Driving Assault.flavor: The force of your rapid attacks throws your enemy from its feet.
Driving Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Driving Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage per attack, you push the target 1 square, and you can shift 1 square toward the target. If both attacks hit, you knock the target prone after the second push.

Staggering Assault.name: Staggering Assault
Staggering Assault.flavor: You deal a savage strike that staggers your adversary.
Staggering Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Staggering Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). If the target is not bloodied when you make this attack, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
Staggering Assault.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit the target, it is slowed (save ends).

Surefooted Retort.name: Surefooted Retort
Surefooted Retort.flavor: Lessening the impact of an incoming attack, you swivel away from your foe and deliver a slash as you come about.
Surefooted Retort.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Surefooted Retort.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Surefooted Retort.effect: If the triggering attack would knock you prone or slow you, negate the condition. Reduce any pull, push, or slide from the triggering attack by a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Fortuitous Dodge.name: Fortuitous Dodge
Fortuitous Dodge.flavor: You duck out of the way of an incoming attack, and it strikes another target.
Fortuitous Dodge.trigger: A melee or a ranged attack misses you
Fortuitous Dodge.target: One creature other than the attacker
Fortuitous Dodge.effect: The target is also targeted by the triggering attack. You can then shift 1 square.

Sidestep Stance.name: Sidestep Stance
Sidestep Stance.flavor: You go on the defensive against a particular opponent, watching carefully for its attacks.
Sidestep Stance.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Sidestep Stance.effect: Choose one enemy within 5 squares of you that you can see. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC against that enemy’s melee attacks and ranged attacks if you can see the enemy. You can choose a new enemy as a minor action.

Threatening Glare.name: Threatening Glare
Threatening Glare.flavor: Your hostile visage warns enemies to beware your wrath.
Threatening Glare.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Threatening Glare.effect: Until the end of your turn, opportunity attacks against you deal half damage, and if an enemy makes an opportunity attack against you, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Vault Position.name: Vault Position
Vault Position.flavor: You assume a balanced pose, ready to leap away from danger at a moment’s notice.
Vault Position.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics and Athletics.
Vault Position.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 power bonus to Reflex. As a minor action, you can make an Athletics check to jump, but doing so ends the stance.

Vexing Flanker.name: Vexing Flanker
Vexing Flanker.flavor: Nimble feet and intense focus keep you on your foe.
Vexing Flanker.trigger: An ally enters a square adjacent to an enemy adjacent to you
Vexing Flanker.effect: You can shift to any other square adjacent to the enemy.

Dismaying Slash.name: Dismaying Slash
Dismaying Slash.flavor: Your ripping strike saps your foe’s determination.
Dismaying Slash.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Dismaying Slash.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

From the Shadows.name: From the Shadows
From the Shadows.flavor: You spring from the shadows to strike, and then you fade away as if you were never there.
From the Shadows.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
From the Shadows.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 2 squares. If the target could not see you before the shift, you gain combat advantage for this attack.
From the Shadows.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 2 squares. If you have any cover or concealment after this shift, you can make a Stealth check as a free action.
From the Shadows.artfulDodger: Before the attack and after the hit, you can instead shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.

Hectoring Strike.name: Hectoring Strike
Hectoring Strike.flavor: You deliver a strong attack, dampening your opponent’s fighting spirit.
Hectoring Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Hectoring Strike.brutalScoundrel: You slide the target 1 square, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Agonizing Shot.name: Agonizing Shot
Agonizing Shot.flavor: Your precise aim finds a weak spot.
Agonizing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Agonizing Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Agonizing Shot.aftereffect: The target is slowed and takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends both).
Agonizing Shot.onMiss: Half damage, no ongoing damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Burst Fire.name: Burst Fire
Burst Fire.flavor: You loose missiles in an unpredictable pattern.
Burst Fire.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Burst Fire.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Into Harm's Way.name: Into Harm's Way
Into Harm's Way.flavor: You deliver a slashing feint, causing your enemy to stumble into more danger.
Into Harm's Way.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Into Harm's Way.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. Then an ally of yours can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action.

Not It.name: Not It
Not It.flavor: Your sly attack directs your foe’s attention to your ally.
Not It.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Not It.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to you or the target marks the target until the start of your next turn.

Rogue's Recovery.name: Rogue's Recovery
Rogue's Recovery.flavor: With a cunning attack, you create a new opportunity for yourself.
Rogue's Recovery.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Rogue's Recovery.effect: If you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a rogue encounter attack power you have used during this encounter. Or if you have combat advantage against the target, you can instead deal 2[W] extra damage with the attack.

Vexing Escape.name: Vexing Escape
Vexing Escape.flavor: Your timely attack allows you to break away from combat, and you remain one step ahead of your foe thereafter.
Vexing Escape.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Vexing Escape.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.
Vexing Escape.onMiss: Half damage, and you can shift 1 square.
Vexing Escape.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time the target enters a square adjacent to you, you can shift 1 square as an immediate reaction.

Vexing Sting.name: Vexing Sting
Vexing Sting.flavor: Despite your foe’s armor, you drive your point home, disheartening him.
Vexing Sting.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Vexing Sting.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Brisk Stride.name: Brisk Stride
Brisk Stride.flavor: Leaping across minor obstacles, you dart across the battlefield.
Brisk Stride.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Brisk Stride.effect: You can move your speed + 4. During this movement and until the end of your next turn, you can move across difficult terrain at your normal speed.

Executioner's Mien.name: Executioner's Mien
Executioner's Mien.flavor: Every one of your attacks exudes a murderous intent that unnerves your adversaries.
Executioner's Mien.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Executioner's Mien.effect: Until the stance ends, all your attacks gain the rattling keyword.

Gap in the Armor.name: Gap in the Armor
Gap in the Armor.flavor: You take a moment to find a weak point in your opponent’s defenses.
Gap in the Armor.prerequisite: You must be trained in Perception.
Gap in the Armor.effect: Choose an enemy within 5 squares of you. You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the end of the encounter.

Daunting Attack.name: Daunting Attack
Daunting Attack.flavor: Your attack resonates with your cold-blooded intent, overwhelming your enemy’s resolve.
Daunting Attack.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Daunting Attack.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Daunting Attack.ruthlessRuffian: f the target is already taking the penalty to attack rolls from one of your rattling attacks, instead of being dazed, the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Powerful Shot.name: Powerful Shot
Powerful Shot.flavor: The sharp force of your shot causes your foe to stumble.
Powerful Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Powerful Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, you push the target 1 square, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Skip Shot.name: Skip Shot
Skip Shot.flavor: Your missile careens off your foe and grazes another enemy.
Skip Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Skip Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and an enemy within 3 squares of the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Bold Feint.name: Bold Feint
Bold Feint.flavor: With a rakish flourish of your weapon, you misdirect your foe’s thrust into his ally.
Bold Feint.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack and another enemy is within its reach
Bold Feint.prerequisite: You must be trained in Bluff.
Bold Feint.onHit: Choose an enemy within the target’s reach. That enemy is instead the target of the triggering attack.

Finish It.name: Finish It
Finish It.flavor: A lethal stab hastens your foe’s demise.
Finish It.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Finish It.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage. The ongoing damage lasts until the creature is no longer bloodied.
Finish It.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Vicious Cooperation.name: Vicious Cooperation
Vicious Cooperation.flavor: Your attack gives your comrade the perfect opening to thump your opponent.
Vicious Cooperation.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Vicious Cooperation.effect: An ally flanking the target with you can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. You can deal Sneak Attack damage to the target if either you or the ally hit it.

Wounding Strike.name: Wounding Strike
Wounding Strike.flavor: You strike, intending to inflict grave injury.
Wounding Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Wounding Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target is not bloodied before you make this attack, the attack also deals ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Defensive Roll.name: Defensive Roll
Defensive Roll.flavor: As you evade an attack, you tumble into a better spot.
Defensive Roll.trigger: You are missed by an attack
Defensive Roll.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics

Denying Stance.name: Denying Stance
Denying Stance.flavor: The attacks of your enemies allow you to better size them up and avoid future blows.
Denying Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, each time an enemy misses you with a melee or a ranged attack, that enemy takes a –2 penalty to its next attack roll against you.

Audacious Strike.name: Audacious Strike
Audacious Strike.flavor: You lunge forward recklessly, then roll defensively to the side.
Audacious Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.

Blistering Outburst.name: Blistering Outburst
Blistering Outburst.flavor: In a flurry of lunges and strikes, you leave nearby foes unable to give decisive counterattacks.
Blistering Outburst.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Blistering Outburst.target: Each creature in the burst you can see
Blistering Outburst.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Bloodbath Attack.name: Bloodbath Attack
Bloodbath Attack.flavor: Your vicious attack leaves the enemy lying in a pool of his own blood.
Bloodbath Attack.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Bloodbath Attack.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, you knock the target prone, and it takes ongoing damage equal to your Strength modifier (save ends).
Bloodbath Attack.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target, the target takes ongoing damage equal to your Strength modifier (save ends).

Blood Squall.name: Blood Squall
Blood Squall.flavor: Your blade flashes like lightning, and fountains of blood erupt from the foes around you.
Blood Squall.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Blood Squall.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Blood Squall.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Blood Squall.onMiss: Half damage, and no ongoing damage.

Daunting Barrage.name: Daunting Barrage
Daunting Barrage.flavor: A blistering volley of projectiles knocks your enemies for a loop.
Daunting Barrage.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Daunting Barrage.target: Each enemy in the blast you can see
Daunting Barrage.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Daunting Barrage.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed.

Marked Beating.name: Marked Beating
Marked Beating.flavor: Using the distraction caused by an ally, you brutalize your foe, leaving it off kilter.
Marked Beating.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Marked Beating.target: One creature marked by an ally
Marked Beating.onHit: 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed and takes a –2 penalty to all defenses (save ends both).
Marked Beating.onMiss: Half damage, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn, and no penalty to defenses.

Stolen Vitality.name: Stolen Vitality
Stolen Vitality.flavor: Your vicious assault leaves your enemy unable to move quickly, and you gain a burst of confidence from the deed.
Stolen Vitality.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Stolen Vitality.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). You gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Charisma modifier.
Stolen Vitality.onMiss: Half damage, the target is slowed until the end of your next turn, and no temporary hit points.

Uncanny Ricochet.name: Uncanny Ricochet
Uncanny Ricochet.flavor: Your attack has such force that if it fails to hit one opponent, it might careen into another.
Uncanny Ricochet.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Uncanny Ricochet.onMiss: Make a secondary attack with combat advantage.
Uncanny Ricochet.secondaryTarget: One creature within 3 squares of the primary target

Mountebank's Flight.name: Mountebank's Flight
Mountebank's Flight.flavor: You steal a bit of magic to stow away on another creature’s teleportation.
Mountebank's Flight.trigger: A creature within 5 squares of you teleports
Mountebank's Flight.effect: You teleport to any square adjacent to the triggering creature.

Thief of Fortune.name: Thief of Fortune
Thief of Fortune.flavor: You make your own luck by stealing it from others.
Thief of Fortune.trigger: Your attack misses or you fail a saving throw
Thief of Fortune.requirement: You must be able to see another creature.
Thief of Fortune.effect: Reroll the triggering attack roll or saving throw and use the new result. One creature you can see takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Crack Shot.name: Crack Shot
Crack Shot.flavor: Your lightning-fast shots send your opponents sprawling.
Crack Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Crack Shot.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Crack Shot.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Collapsing Riposte.name: Collapsing Riposte
Collapsing Riposte.flavor: When your enemy overreaches to attack you, you cut his legs out from under him.
Collapsing Riposte.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Collapsing Riposte.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Collapsing Riposte.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Collapsing Riposte.artfulDodger: The target is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

Death Dance.name: Death Dance
Death Dance.flavor: Masterfully lunging and weaving, you deliver a series of powerful attacks and then slip to a new location.
Death Dance.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Death Dance.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Death Dance.brutalScoundrel: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Fettering Shot.name: Fettering Shot
Fettering Shot.flavor: With a clever shot, you pin your target to the spot.
Fettering Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Fettering Shot.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Cruel Pursuit.name: Cruel Pursuit
Cruel Pursuit.flavor: Your initial probing attack makes your enemy lurch to one side, allowing you to move up and finish with a wounding strike.
Cruel Pursuit.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Cruel Pursuit.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier. You can then shift a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier to a square adjacent to the target.
Cruel Pursuit.onMiss: Half damage, you slide the target 2 squares, and you can then shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to the target.
Cruel Pursuit.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.

Magnetic Shot.name: Magnetic Shot
Magnetic Shot.flavor: You distract your adversary just long enough to deliver a shot that bypasses armor.
Magnetic Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Magnetic Shot.onHit: 6[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier + Charisma modifier damage.

Rogue's Resurgence.name: Rogue's Resurgence
Rogue's Resurgence.flavor: You strike with murderous exactness and then pull a deadly exploit back out of your bag of tricks.
Rogue's Resurgence.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Rogue's Resurgence.effect: If you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a rogue encounter attack power you have used during this encounter. Or if you have combat advantage against the target, you can instead deal 4[W] extra damage with the attack.

Shocking Execution.name: Shocking Execution
Shocking Execution.flavor: You viciously lunge for a wounded enemy’s throat and shock its allies.
Shocking Execution.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Shocking Execution.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Shocking Execution.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and each enemy within 3 squares of you takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Shocking Execution.onMiss: Half damage, and each enemy within 3 squares of you takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

Visceral Strike.name: Visceral Strike
Visceral Strike.flavor: You cut open your foe across the middle, drastically hampering her actions.
Visceral Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Visceral Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Visceral Strike.aftereffect: The target is weakened and slowed (save ends both).
Visceral Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened and slowed until the end of your next turn.

Hurling Pounce.name: Hurling Pounce
Hurling Pounce.flavor: As you send one foe staggering away from you, you spring on another.
Hurling Pounce.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hurling Pounce.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the primary target 2 squares. You can then shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Hurling Pounce.brutalScoundrel: You can instead push the primary target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Strength modifier.
Hurling Pounce.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Safe Bet.name: Safe Bet
Safe Bet.flavor: With an initial strike, you set yourself up to spring at your enemy if she dares to attack again.
Safe Bet.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Safe Bet.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target makes an attack before the start of your next turn, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier and make a basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

Skirmishing Strike.name: Skirmishing Strike
Skirmishing Strike.flavor: You move hastily to take your shot and then depart.
Skirmishing Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Skirmishing Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square.
Skirmishing Strike.artfulDodger: You can instead shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

Deathweaving Strike.name: Deathweaving Strike
Deathweaving Strike.flavor: Your attack sends the enemy lurching past your comrades, who take advantage by making attacks of their own.
Deathweaving Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Deathweaving Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier. Each of your allies adjacent to the target at any point during this forced movement can make a basic attack against the target as an opportunity action. Each ally’s attack has combat advantage and deals extra damage equal to your Charisma modifier on a hit.

Sight-Stealing Shot.name: Sight-Stealing Shot
Sight-Stealing Shot.flavor: You attack your foe in the eyes, leaving him dumbfounded and temporarily unable to see.
Sight-Stealing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light thrown weapon, or a sling.
Sight-Stealing Shot.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded and dazed (save ends both).
Sight-Stealing Shot.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Checking Jab.name: Checking Jab
Checking Jab.flavor: You smile callously as your attack lands, cowing your enemy into an overcautious state.
Checking Jab.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
