Checking Jab.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). You have combat advantage against the target while it is slowed by this attack.
Checking Jab.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not slowed.

Clever Strike.name: Clever Strike
Clever Strike.flavor: You can turn even a minor distraction into an opportunity for a deadly attack.
Clever Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Clever Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Clever Strike.special: If an ally is adjacent to the target and is able to attack it, you have combat advantage against the target for this attack.

Probing Strike.name: Probing Strike
Probing Strike.flavor: As you attack, you perceive a flaw in the enemy’s defenses.
Probing Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Increase damage to 2[W] + Dexterity modifier at 21st level.
Probing Strike.effect: You gain a +1 power bonus to your next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.

Hidden Blade.name: Hidden Blade
Hidden Blade.sourceRef: PH Heroes: Series 1, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Hidden Blade.flavor: You conceal a small weapon until it’s time to strike.
Hidden Blade.prerequisite: You must have training in Thievery.
Hidden Blade.effect: You gain combat advantage for the next attack you make with an off-hand weapon before the end of your turn.

Slice Free.name: Slice Free
Slice Free.flavor: You pain your grasping enemy, allowing yourself an opening to tumble away.
Slice Free.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Slice Free.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If you’re grabbed, you escape. You can shift half your speed.

Sneaky Roll.name: Sneaky Roll
Sneaky Roll.flavor: You take advantage of your foe’s success to somersault into a better position.
Sneaky Roll.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Sneaky Roll.trigger: You are hit by a melee attack.
Sneaky Roll.effect: You can shift half your speed, including through squares occupied by enemies.

Darting Strike.name: Darting Strike
Darting Strike.flavor: You move your weapon with blinding speed, striking a foe who didn’t realize it was open to an attack.
Darting Strike.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Darting Strike.trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you makes a ranged or area attack, or moves without shifting or teleporting
Darting Strike.effect: You shift 2 squares to a space adjacent to the enemy and make the following attack with combat advantage.

Tumbling Strike.name: Tumbling Strike
Tumbling Strike.flavor: With great agility, you cross harsh terrain and weave through foes just before making your enemy regret it ever confronted you in battle.
Tumbling Strike.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Tumbling Strike.effect: You shift your speed and make the following attack at any point during the shift. During this shift, you can shift through squares occupied by enemies and you ignore difficult terrain.

Reaching Blade.name: Reaching Blade
Reaching Blade.flavor: Your skill allows you to take advantage of openings granted by foes even some distance away.
Reaching Blade.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Reaching Blade.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an ally within 3 squares of you hits with an opportunity attack, you can, as a free action, shift your speed to a space adjacent to the target of that attack and use a rogue at-will melee attack power against that target.

Duelist's Flurry.name: Duelist's Flurry
Duelist's Flurry.flavor: You move your blade quickly, stinging your foe with a series of cuts and slashes. Each slice does little damage, but when combined, they form a deadly threat.
Duelist's Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Duelist's Flurry.onHit:
Dexterity modifier damage, slide the target 1 square, and you shift 1 square. You may use your sneak attack damage even if you do not have combat advantage with this attack.
Level 21: 5 + Dexterity modifier damage.

Opening Move.name: Opening Move
Opening Move.flavor: While your enemies fumble for weapons or stand and gape, you leap into the fray to score a deadly hit.
Opening Move.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Opening Move.effect: You gain a power bonus to AC and Reflex equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Opening Move.artfulDodger: The defense bonus equals 2 + your Charisma modifier.

Duelist's Prowess.name: Duelist's Prowess
Duelist's Prowess.flavor: The way you stand appears to allow a foe an opening, but in truth your skill is such that you use your foe’s attack to draw it in for your own quick strike.
Duelist's Prowess.effect: Until the stance ends, each time an enemy hits or misses you, you can use the Duelist's Prowess Attack power against it.
Duelist's Prowess.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Duelist's Prowess.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you attacks you

Agile Footwork.name: Agile Footwork
Agile Footwork.sourceRef: Dragon Magazine 381, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Agile Footwork.flavor: Though your foe wants to move in closely, you’d rather keep your distance, so you nimbly move away.
Agile Footwork.trigger: An enemy ends its turn adjacent to you.

Strike and Move.name: Strike and Move
Strike and Move.flavor: You dart in, slash with your blade, and dart away before your enemy can answer.
Strike and Move.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Strike and Move.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. At any point during this shift, you can make the following attack.
Strike and Move.artfulDodger: You instead shift 2 + your Charisma modifier squares.

Duelist's Demand.name: Duelist's Demand
Duelist's Demand.flavor: You hem your foe in with a series of deadly strikes. It cannot move as long as your weapon is ready to strike.
Duelist's Demand.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Duelist's Demand.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and grants combat advantage to you. This effect ends if the target ends its turn and you are not adjacent to it.
Duelist's Demand.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized and grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Swift Parry.name: Swift Parry
Swift Parry.sourceRef: Dragon Magazine 381, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Swift Parry.flavor: You deflect your enemy’s attack, causing the force behind its blow to send it off balance and leaving it vulnerable to your next attack.
Swift Parry.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Swift Parry.trigger: You are hit by a melee attack
Swift Parry.effect: You gain a bonus to defenses against the triggering attack equal to your Charisma modifier, and you gain combat advantage against the attacker until the end of your next turn.

Lashing Blade.name: Lashing Blade
Lashing Blade.flavor: A foe near you feels the sting of your blade as you lash out, but you attack so with such agility that this enemy has a problem returning the favor.
Lashing Blade.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can use the Lashing Blade Attack power.
Lashing Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade. The power Lashing Blade must be active in order to use this power.
Lashing Blade.trigger: An enemy starts its turn in or enters a square adjacent to you
Lashing Blade.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a penalty to attacks against you equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Lashing Blade.artfulDodger: The attack penalty equals 2 + your Charisma modifier.

Vaulting Charge.name: Vaulting Charge
Vaulting Charge.flavor: You rush forward and leap into the air, skewering a foe that thought it was safe behind its allies.
Vaulting Charge.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Vaulting Charge.effect: You shift your speed before making the following attack, and you can move through enemies’ spaces. You gain a power bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Vaulting Charge.artfulDodger: The AC bonus equals 2 + your Charisma modifier.
Vaulting Charge.attack: Dexterity vs. AC, or Dexterity vs. Reflex if the target has not yet acted in combat.

Path of the Blade.name: Path of the Blade
Path of the Blade.flavor: You slash at your enemies, forcing them to part before you as you rush your intended enemy.
Path of the Blade.requirement: The power Path of the Blade must be active in order to use this power.
Path of the Blade.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier. Two times during this shift, you can use the Path of the Blade Attack power, each time against a different enemy adjacent to you.
Path of the Blade.artfulDodger: You instead shift 4 + your Charisma modifier squares.
Path of the Blade.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage and you slide the creature 1 square.
Path of the Blade.secondaryTarget: One enemy other than the primary target
Path of the Blade.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the creature 1 square.

Shimmering Blade.name: Shimmering Blade
Shimmering Blade.flavor: You stand ready to counter each of your enemies’ moves, your blade a blur of steel as you strike again and again.
Shimmering Blade.effect: You gain a power bonus to AC and Reflex equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
Shimmering Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Shimmering Blade.trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against you, starts its turn adjacent to you, or ends its turn adjacent to you
Shimmering Blade.artfulDodger: The defense bonus equals 2 + your Charisma modifier.

First and Final Strike.name: First and Final Strike
First and Final Strike.flavor: As your enemy fumbles for its weapon, you stride forward to deliver a deadly attack.
First and Final Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
First and Final Strike.effect: You can shift your speed before making the following attack and can move through enemies’ spaces. You gain a power bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of your next turn.
First and Final Strike.artfulDodger: The AC bonus instead equals 2 + your Charisma modifier.
First and Final Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if the target has not yet acted in combat.

Acrobatic Strike.name: Acrobatic Strike
Acrobatic Strike.flavor: You flip and twist as you attack, confounding your foe.
Acrobatic Strike.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Acrobatic Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Acrobatic Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If you are grabbed, you escape the grab.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Acrobatic Strike.effect: Before or after the attack, you shift 1 square.

Gloaming Cut.name: Gloaming Cut
Gloaming Cut.flavor: From the shadows you strike, and into the shadows you flee.
Gloaming Cut.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Gloaming Cut.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier, and you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.

Preparatory Shot.name: Preparatory Shot
Preparatory Shot.flavor: You feint and nick the target, inhibiting its movement to set up an even deadlier attack.
Preparatory Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Preparatory Shot.onHit:
Dexterity modifier + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 5 + Dexterity modifier + Intelligence modifier damage.

Acrobat's Blade Trick.name: Acrobat's Blade Trick
Acrobat's Blade Trick.flavor: You flip into a spinning acrobatic display of flashing blades. Then the display transforms into a deadly attack.
Acrobat's Blade Trick.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Acrobat's Blade Trick.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Acrobat's Blade Trick.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Acrobat's Blade Trick.effect: After the attack, you can shift a number of squares equal to the number of enemies you hit with this attack. During the shift, you can move through squares occupied by enemies you hit with this attack.

Distracting Shot.name: Distracting Shot
Distracting Shot.flavor: Your attack draws your enemy’s attention long enough to give your ally an opening.
Distracting Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Distracting Shot.cunningSneak: If you are hidden when you attack, you can make a Stealth check to remain hidden if you have superior cover or total concealment.
Distracting Shot.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to one of your allies adjacent to it.

One-Two Punch.name: One-Two Punch
One-Two Punch.flavor: You stab your blade into the back of a foe and then plunge it into the chest of another.
One-Two Punch.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
One-Two Punch.onHit: 1[W] damage. If you hit both targets, you can deal your Sneak Attack damage to each target instead of just one.

Shadow Strike.name: Shadow Strike
Shadow Strike.flavor: You emerge from the darkness, delivering a quick strike before retreating back into the shadows.
Shadow Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Shadow Strike.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If you are hidden when you attack, you can make a Stealth check to remain hidden after the attack.

Skip the Rock.name: Skip the Rock
Skip the Rock.flavor: Your sling stone skips off the first target and smashes into another one.
Skip the Rock.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Skip the Rock.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Skip the Rock.secondaryTarget: One creature within 10 squares of the primary target
Skip the Rock.secondaryOnHit: Dexterity modifier damage, and the secondary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Skip the Rock.cunningSneak: The secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Hounding Assault.name: Hounding Assault
Hounding Assault.flavor: Your vicious attack rends flesh and courage alike, leaving your foe quivering.
Hounding Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Hounding Assault.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your melee attacks have the rattling keyword.

Scattering Shot.name: Scattering Shot
Scattering Shot.flavor: Enemies flee from the target of your attack, each fearing it will be your next victim.
Scattering Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Scattering Shot.onMiss: You do not expend this power if you were hidden from the target when you made the attack.
Scattering Shot.effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends). In addition, each enemy adjacent to the target is pushed 1 square away from the target.

Spinning Blade Leap.name: Spinning Blade Leap
Spinning Blade Leap.flavor: You leap into the air, landing atop your foe. You stab down and then leap off.
Spinning Blade Leap.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Spinning Blade Leap.effect: Before and after the attack, you shift your speed.

Twilight Menace.name: Twilight Menace
Twilight Menace.flavor: Your assault menaces your foe, causing it to flinch and look away as you continue your relentless attack.
Twilight Menace.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Twilight Menace.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target treats you as having concealment (save ends).
Twilight Menace.onMiss: Half damage, and the target treats you as having concealment until the end of your next turn.

Arm and Edge.name: Arm and Edge
Arm and Edge.flavor: You sharpen your aim and flex your arm, preparing to hurl your dagger at a distant foe.
Arm and Edge.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you make a ranged attack with a thrown weapon or a sling, you double the normal range and the long range.

Cunning Step.name: Cunning Step
Cunning Step.flavor: You cut corners and dodge obstacles, making it seem as though you move with unnatural speed.
Cunning Step.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a power bonus to speed equal to half your Intelligence modifier.

Deadly Knowledge.name: Deadly Knowledge
Deadly Knowledge.flavor: You twist your weapon or adjust your aim, hurting your foe a little more than usual.
Deadly Knowledge.trigger: Your attack bloodies an enemy or scores a critical hit against an enemy
Deadly Knowledge.effect: The triggering attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier to the enemy.

Lurker's Cloak.name: Lurker's Cloak
Lurker's Cloak.flavor: You maximize the benefit of the obstacle or shadows hiding you.
Lurker's Cloak.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses while you have any concealment or any cover.

Switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
Switcheroo.flavor: You pull the old switcheroo to put your enemies off guard.
Switcheroo.target: You and one ally in the burst

Brutal Trick.name: Brutal Trick
Brutal Trick.flavor: You create an opening that lulls your foe into a false sense of security. Then you unleash a devastating attack.
Brutal Trick.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Brutal Trick.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. This attack provokes an opportunity attack from the target. If the target misses with the opportunity attack, you target the lower of its AC or Reflex.
Brutal Trick.ruthlessRuffian: If the target misses or does not make the opportunity attack, you can target the lower of its AC, Fortitude, or Reflex.

Flailing Shove.name: Flailing Shove
Flailing Shove.flavor: The enemy recoils from your slashing blade and accidentally strikes its allies.
Flailing Shove.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Flailing Shove.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You push the target 1 square, and after the push, each enemy adjacent to the target takes 3 damage.
Flailing Shove.brutalScoundrel: Each enemy instead takes damage equal to 2 + your Strength modifier.

Flattening Shot.name: Flattening Shot
Flattening Shot.flavor: Your sling’s stone careens toward an enemy and hits with a crack, knocking it over.
Flattening Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Flattening Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Flattening Shot.cunningSneak: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Fleeting Spirit Strike.name: Fleeting Spirit Strike
Fleeting Spirit Strike.flavor: You dart from shadow to shadow, striking out along the way.
Fleeting Spirit Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Fleeting Spirit Strike.effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.
Fleeting Spirit Strike.cunningSneak: After the shift, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.
Fleeting Spirit Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You shift 3 squares.

Jumping Blade Assault.name: Jumping Blade Assault
Jumping Blade Assault.flavor: You deliver a flying kick to the face of your foe, knocking it to the ground. You then plunge your blade into its vitals.
Jumping Blade Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Jumping Blade Assault.artfulDodger: If you use this power as part of a charge, you can target Reflex instead of AC.
Jumping Blade Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Maneuvering Strike.name: Maneuvering Strike
Maneuvering Strike.flavor: Ducking to the side, you drive your weapon upward. You force your opponent to step away or face a devastating follow-up attack.
Maneuvering Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Maneuvering Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. If you slide the target, it grants combat advantage to one ally you can see until the end of your next turn. If you don’t slide the target, it grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Steel Roll.name: Shadow Steel Roll
Shadow Steel Roll.flavor: You roll from shadow to shadow, your blade carving a path through your foes.
Shadow Steel Roll.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Shadow Steel Roll.effect: Before the attack, you shift your speed, and you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.
Shadow Steel Roll.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If you are hidden when you attack, you remain hidden after the attack.
Shadow Steel Roll.cunningSneak: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Bat Aside.name: Bat Aside
Bat Aside.flavor: You ram into your foe, sending it flying into one of its allies.
Bat Aside.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Bat Aside.effect: You slide the target 5 squares to a square adjacent to one or more of its allies. You knock the target prone and also knock prone each one of its allies adjacent to it.

Bloodbath.name: Bloodbath
Bloodbath.flavor: You slice your foe’s artery, inflicting a gushing wound.
Bloodbath.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Bloodbath.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing damage equal to any Sneak Attack damage you deal with this attack (save ends).

Go for the Eyes.name: Go for the Eyes
Go for the Eyes.flavor: You strike at your foe’s face, attempting to blind the creature. If you miss, the creature would do well to find you before you repeat your attack.
Go for the Eyes.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Go for the Eyes.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is blinded and can’t shift until the end of your next turn.
Go for the Eyes.aftereffect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you damage the target, it takes a −2 penalty to attack rolls and can’t shift until the end of your next turn.
Go for the Eyes.onMiss: If you were hidden from the target before the attack, you do not expend this power.

Hobble.name: Hobble
Hobble.flavor: You slash at your foe with a brutal attack that cripples it.
Hobble.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Hobble.effect: You knock the target prone. The target can’t stand up (save ends).

Lurker's Assault.name: Lurker's Assault
Lurker's Assault.flavor: Shadows mask your movement, helping you to shuffle into position and deliver a wicked attack.
Lurker's Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Lurker's Assault.effect: If you are hidden from the target, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier before the attack. You remain hidden during this movement.
Lurker's Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Lurker's Assault.cunningSneak: After the shift, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.

Mocking Strike.name: Mocking Strike
Mocking Strike.flavor: You mimic your foe’s movements, causing the creature to second-guess itself.
Mocking Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -3 penalty to all defenses against your attacks until the end of the encounter.
Mocking Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -3 penalty to all defenses against your attacks (save ends).

Blind Spot Advantage.name: Blind Spot Advantage
Blind Spot Advantage.flavor: You take advantage of your enemy’s blind spot to ensure that you won’t be hit.
Blind Spot Advantage.effect: You gain concealment against one enemy you can see until the end of your next turn.

Perfect Feint.name: Perfect Feint
Perfect Feint.flavor: Your feint takes everyone by surprise.
Perfect Feint.prerequisite: You must be trained in Bluff.
Perfect Feint.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Perfect Feint.effect: Each target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Ugly Finish.name: Ugly Finish
Ugly Finish.flavor: A bloody display of force rattles nearby enemies.
Ugly Finish.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Ugly Finish.trigger: You score a critical hit against an enemy with a melee attack or reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with a melee attack
Ugly Finish.effect: Each target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls and grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Double Fall.name: Double Fall
Double Fall.flavor: With a flourish of your weapon, you strike at two foes, attempting to bring each down.
Double Fall.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Double Fall.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Killer's Ambush.name: Killer's Ambush
Killer's Ambush.flavor: Your enemy doesn’t see you until it’s too late, and by then, you’ve left it a gaping wound to remember you by.
Killer's Ambush.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Killer's Ambush.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Killer's Ambush.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You shift 1 square.
Killer's Ambush.cunningSneak: You shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier, and you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.

Leg-Breaker.name: Leg-Breaker
Leg-Breaker.flavor: You deliver a crushing strike to your enemy’s limb that causes it to crumple in pain.
Leg-Breaker.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Leg-Breaker.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target moves 2 squares or more during its next turn, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Leg-Breaker.brutalScoundrelOrRuthlessRuffian: The damage the target takes for moving equals your Strength modifier + your Dexterity modifier.

Pinning Blade.name: Pinning Blade
Pinning Blade.flavor: You jam your weapon into your foe’s foot, pinning it to the ground.
Pinning Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Pinning Blade.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Shadow Boxer.name: Shadow Boxer
Shadow Boxer.flavor: You attack from your foe’s shadow, confounding the creature as you slip in and out of sight.
Shadow Boxer.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Shadow Boxer.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and until the end of your next turn, the target grants superior cover to you while you are adjacent to it.
Shadow Boxer.effect: You can make a Stealth check to become hidden.
Shadow Boxer.cunningSneak: You gain a bonus to the Stealth check equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Aerial Assault.name: Aerial Assault
Aerial Assault.flavor: You launch yourself at your foe in a display of aerial finesse. The creature stands awestruck until you sink your weapon into it.
Aerial Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Aerial Assault.effect: Before the attack, you move your speed and can make an Athletics check to jump with a +10 bonus to the check. You do not provoke opportunity attacks during the jump.
Aerial Assault.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex. The target grants combat advantage to you for the attack if you jumped 3 squares or more before the attack.

Bewildering Assault.name: Bewildering Assault
Bewildering Assault.flavor: You attack from the darkness and deliver a blow that unbalances your foe. You then retreat to the shadows.
Bewildering Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Bewildering Assault.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Bewildering Assault.cunningSneak: If you have total concealment or superior cover, you remain hidden after the attack.
Bewildering Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. The target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).
Bewildering Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

One Hundred Knives.name: One Hundred Knives
One Hundred Knives.flavor: Your blade blurs as you plunge it into your foe over and over.
One Hundred Knives.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
One Hundred Knives.effect: Make the following secondary attack twice against the target.

Profit from Weakness.name: Profit from Weakness
Profit from Weakness.flavor: You step aside as the enemy’s attack sweeps toward you. You then slide your blade into a place where the foe is vulnerable.
Profit from Weakness.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Profit from Weakness.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits you with a melee attack

Raining Death.name: Raining Death
Raining Death.flavor: From the shadows, you send out a barrage of attacks, raining death upon your foes.
Raining Death.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Raining Death.target: Each enemy from which you are hidden

Daring Gamble.name: Daring Gamble
Daring Gamble.flavor: Putting yourself at risk gives you the opening you need to bring this battle to its close.
Daring Gamble.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that attacks you grants combat advantage to you until the end of the encounter.

Deadly Sacrifice.name: Deadly Sacrifice
Deadly Sacrifice.flavor: Your threat draws your enemy’s attack. If you survive, you can be certain the foe will pay.
Deadly Sacrifice.trigger: An ally adjacent to you is hit by an enemy’s melee attack
Deadly Sacrifice.effect: You and the target swap places. The attack hits you instead of the target. The enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of the encounter. In addition, your Sneak Attack deals extra damage against the enemy equal to your Intelligence modifier until the end of the encounter.

Fitting Demise.name: Fitting Demise
Fitting Demise.flavor: You emerge from the shadows to deliver a deadly attack. You then retreat back to the darkness, as if you had been there all along.
Fitting Demise.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Fitting Demise.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Fitting Demise.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You can make a Stealth check to remain hidden after the attack.
Fitting Demise.cunningSneak: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Numbing Shot.name: Numbing Shot
Numbing Shot.flavor: Your sling bullet strikes a nerve, causing your enemy to crumple.
Numbing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Numbing Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, you knock the target prone, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Strike of Dancing Shadows.name: Strike of Dancing Shadows
Strike of Dancing Shadows.flavor: The shadows seem to swirl around you as your blades rip through your foes.
Strike of Dancing Shadows.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade and be hidden.
Strike of Dancing Shadows.effect: Before the attack, you shift 1 square and remain hidden during the shift.
Strike of Dancing Shadows.cunningSneak: Add your Intelligence modifier to the number of squares you shift.
Strike of Dancing Shadows.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You shift 1 square and remain hidden during the attack and the shift.

Veiled Missile.name: Veiled Missile
Veiled Missile.flavor: Your weapon flies through the air, catching your foe in the head and causing blood to obscure its vision.
Veiled Missile.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Veiled Missile.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You gain concealment against the target until the end of your next turn.
Veiled Missile.cunningSneak: You can make a Stealth check to become hidden.

Wicked Reminder.name: Wicked Reminder
Wicked Reminder.flavor: Each time the enemy feels the bite from your allies’ attacks, it recalls the injury you dealt it last.
Wicked Reminder.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Wicked Reminder.ruthlessRuffian: If the target is already suffering the effect of the rattling keyword, this attack targets Reflex instead of AC.
Wicked Reminder.effect: The target gains vulnerability to weapon attacks equal to your Strength modifier until the end of your next turn.

Arterial Slice.name: Arterial Slice
Arterial Slice.flavor: You nick one of your enemy’s major arteries, creating a wound that spurts blood.
Arterial Slice.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Arterial Slice.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing damage equal to any Sneak Attack damage you deal with this attack (save ends).

Courage Breaker.name: Courage Breaker
Courage Breaker.flavor: You strike a crippling blow to an enemy, inspiring fear in that creature’s allies.
Courage Breaker.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Courage Breaker.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). Until the target is no longer slowed by this power, any enemy adjacent to the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

Lurker's Threat.name: Lurker's Threat
Lurker's Threat.flavor: You emerge from hiding like a ghost. You stab your foe and send it careening toward nearby enemies.
Lurker's Threat.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Lurker's Threat.primaryTarget: One creature from which you are hidden
Lurker's Threat.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, you slide the primary target 2 squares, and the primary target is dazed (save ends). Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 3.
Lurker's Threat.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Lurker's Threat.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and the primary target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Vicious Slash.name: Vicious Slash
Vicious Slash.flavor: Your vicious assault overcomes your foe with pain, leaving it unable to attack accurately.
Vicious Slash.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Vicious Slash.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Vicious Slash.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Whirlwind of Blades.name: Whirlwind of Blades
Whirlwind of Blades.flavor: You leap and spin past your foe, nicking it with dozens of cuts.
Whirlwind of Blades.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Whirlwind of Blades.effect: Before and after the attack, you move your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target.

Clever Move.name: Clever Move
Clever Move.flavor: An explosion momentarily dazzles your opponents so you can make a quick getaway.
Clever Move.trigger: An enemy makes an area or a close attack against you
Clever Move.effect: You shift your speed. You must end this shift in a square where you have cover, superior cover, concealment, or total concealment against the triggering enemy. After this shift, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden.

Dishonorable Tactics.name: Dishonorable Tactics
Dishonorable Tactics.flavor: After your attack, you duck back under cover and hide.
Dishonorable Tactics.trigger: You make an attack roll against an enemy from which you are hidden
Dishonorable Tactics.effect: You remain hidden from the enemy until the end of your next turn or until you no longer have superior cover or total concealment from the enemy.

Shadow Master.name: Shadow Master
Shadow Master.flavor: Careful movements and deft positioning keep your enemies’ attention elsewhere.
Shadow Master.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you can make a Stealth check to become hidden if you have any concealment or any cover except that provided by intervening allies.

Trap Master.name: Trap Master
Trap Master.flavor: You have learned the ways of locks and traps, so when presented with one, you can disable it with extraordinary speed.
Trap Master.prerequisite: You must be trained in Thievery.
Trap Master.effect: You make a Thievery check to open a lock or disable a trap.

Dazing Shot.name: Dazing Shot
Dazing Shot.flavor: Your sling bullet slams into your target’s head and leaves the enemy reeling.
Dazing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
Dazing Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Dazing Shot.cunningSneak: If the target moves or attacks before the end of its next turn, it falls prone at the end of that action.

Excruciating Reminder.name: Excruciating Reminder
Excruciating Reminder.flavor: You strike your foe, leaving a painful reminder that if it attacks you or an ally again, it will pay the price.
Excruciating Reminder.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Excruciating Reminder.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If the target misses with an attack before the start of your next turn, you can make a ranged or a melee basic attack against the target with combat advantage as an opportunity action.
Excruciating Reminder.ruthlessRuffian: If you hit with the basic attack, the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Leaping Dagger Kick.name: Leaping Dagger Kick
Leaping Dagger Kick.flavor: You leap through the air, crashing into your foe and slashing at it.
Leaping Dagger Kick.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Leaping Dagger Kick.artfulDodger: If you charged the target, it is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Leaping Dagger Kick.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Surprising Assault.name: Surprising Assault
Surprising Assault.flavor: You deliver a swift smash to your opponent’s head, surprising the foe with the brutality of your attack.
Surprising Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Surprising Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Surprising Assault.cunningSneak: The target is stunned instead of dazed if you were hidden from the target when you made the attack.

Unerring Shot.name: Unerring Shot
Unerring Shot.flavor: From your hiding place, you deliver an attack. If you miss, you feel assured you’ ll strike your target next time.
Unerring Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Unerring Shot.onMiss: You do not expend this power if you were hidden from the target when you made the attack.

Blurring Assault.name: Blurring Assault
Blurring Assault.flavor: Your blades lash out to strike anyone you pass as you dart across the battlefield.
Blurring Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Blurring Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Demoralizing Shot.name: Demoralizing Shot
Demoralizing Shot.flavor: Your shot strikes with such potency and accuracy that you daunt foes near the target of your attack.
Demoralizing Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Demoralizing Shot.effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn and is pushed 1 square away from the target.

Hilt Slam.name: Hilt Slam
Hilt Slam.flavor: You brutally slam the blunt end of your weapon into your foe’s head, sending the creature staggering.
Hilt Slam.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hilt Slam.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends). You push the target 5 squares, and you grant combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Hilt Slam.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). You push the target 3 squares.

Maiming Strike.name: Maiming Strike
Maiming Strike.flavor: You deliver a crippling strike that promises to leave your opponent hampered for a while.
Maiming Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Maiming Strike.effect: You knock the target prone. The target is slowed, cannot shift, and cannot charge (save ends all).

Merciless Cut.name: Merciless Cut
Merciless Cut.flavor: You slip up behind your enemy and slash across its back.
Merciless Cut.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Merciless Cut.effect: Before the attack, you shift your speed.
Merciless Cut.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Clinging Shadows.name: Clinging Shadows
Clinging Shadows.flavor: The shadows seem to follow your every step.
Clinging Shadows.requirement: You must have concealment or total concealment.
Clinging Shadows.effect: Your concealment or total concealment lasts until the end of your next turn.

Indomitable Agility.name: Indomitable Agility
Indomitable Agility.flavor: When you want to be free, no force can stop you.
Indomitable Agility.effect: You are no longer dazed, grabbed, immobilized, marked, restrained, or slowed. In addition, you shift your speed and can move through enemies’ squares during the shift.

Killer's Instinct.name: Killer's Instinct
Killer's Instinct.flavor: Sensing weakness in your foe, you close the gap between you and it.
Killer's Instinct.trigger: An enemy you can see becomes bloodied
Killer's Instinct.effect: You shift your speed and must end this shift closer to the triggering enemy. If you end this shift adjacent to the triggering enemy, it grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Somersault Dodge.name: Somersault Dodge
Somersault Dodge.flavor: You flip away from your foe as its attack flies wide.
Somersault Dodge.prerequisite: You must be trained in Acrobatics.
Somersault Dodge.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee or a ranged attack

Uncanny Aim (Rogue).name: Uncanny Aim (Rogue)
Uncanny Aim (Rogue).flavor: Everything around you fades away momentarily as you focus on a distant target.
Uncanny Aim (Rogue).effect: You increase the normal range and the long range of your next ranged attack before the end of your turn by 20 squares.

Cutthroat's Rebuke.name: Cutthroat's Rebuke
Cutthroat's Rebuke.flavor: You slash at your foe and take up a defensive posture. You assure your foe that it will suffer dire consequences if it attacks you again.
Cutthroat's Rebuke.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Cutthroat's Rebuke.ruthlessRuffian: This power gains the rattling keyword.
Cutthroat's Rebuke.effect: The next time the target makes a melee attack against you before the end of your next turn, you can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action. If your melee basic attack hits, you knock the target prone.

Dazing Double Shot.name: Dazing Double Shot
Dazing Double Shot.flavor: A pair of carefully placed attacks causes your foes to hesitate.
Dazing Double Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Dazing Double Shot.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Fell the Strong.name: Fell the Strong
Fell the Strong.flavor: Your shot sinks into your foe, causing excruciating pain.
Fell the Strong.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Fell the Strong.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. The next time the target attacks before the end of your next turn, it takes damage equal to twice your Intelligence modifier.
Fell the Strong.cunningSneak: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn if you were hidden from it when you made the attack.

Killer's Retreat.name: Killer's Retreat
Killer's Retreat.flavor: You jab your weapon into tender flesh, forcing the opponent to let you slip away.
Killer's Retreat.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Killer's Retreat.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and if you were marked, you are no longer marked. You shift 2 squares.
Killer's Retreat.cunningSneak: You instead shift a number of squares equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier, and you can make a Stealth check to become hidden after the shift.

Tendon Tear.name: Tendon Tear
Tendon Tear.flavor: You run your weapon across your foe’s tendons, crippling the creature.
Tendon Tear.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Tendon Tear.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. You knock the target prone, and it is restrained until the end of your next turn.

Astounding Assault.name: Astounding Assault
Astounding Assault.flavor: Your prowess shocks your foe into hesitation and indecision.
Astounding Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Astounding Assault.onHit: 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 5 squares. In addition, either the target takes a –10 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn, or it is restrained (save ends).

Bounding Assault.name: Bounding Assault
Bounding Assault.flavor: You dash across the battlefield, ducking under and leaping over foes’ attacks. Then you deliver a brutal attack against your enemy.
Bounding Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Bounding Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack. The charge’s movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Perfect Shot.name: Perfect Shot
Perfect Shot.flavor: With time and preparation, you can’t miss.
Perfect Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Perfect Shot.target: One creature granting combat advantage to you
Perfect Shot.effect: You hit the target and deal 4[W] damage.

Persistent Menace.name: Persistent Menace
Persistent Menace.flavor: Slashing and stabbing, you haunt your enemy’s every move.
Persistent Menace.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Persistent Menace.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 20 damage (save ends).
Persistent Menace.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Persistent Menace.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you deal damage to the target, it takes a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Ricocheting Strike.name: Ricocheting Strike
Ricocheting Strike.flavor: Your attack is so powerful that it reverberates against nearby foes.
Ricocheting Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Ricocheting Strike.primaryTarget: One creature granting combat advantage to you
Ricocheting Strike.effect: Make a secondary attack of the same attack type as the primary attack.
Ricocheting Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature adjacent to the primary target
Ricocheting Strike.secondaryOnHit: Dexterity modifier damage, plus any Sneak Attack damage you dealt to the primary target.

Craven's Bane.name: Craven's Bane
Craven's Bane.flavor: A mix of threats and slashes leaves your foe in fear and agony.
Craven's Bane.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Craven's Bane.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage. If this attack bloodies the target, it moves its speed away from you, taking the safest path possible.
Craven's Bane.ruthlessRuffian: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Deflected Strike.name: Deflected Strike
Deflected Strike.flavor: The enemy’s attack misses you and hits an adjacent enemy instead as you dodge nimbly out of the way.
Deflected Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Deflected Strike.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack, and a different enemy is adjacent to you
Deflected Strike.onHit: The attack hits an enemy adjacent to you other than the target. You can add your Sneak Attack damage to the attack’s damage, even if you have already used your Sneak Attack during this round.
Deflected Strike.cunningSneak: Both enemies grant combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

From Pebble to Boulder.name: From Pebble to Boulder
From Pebble to Boulder.flavor: A stone from your sling strikes your foe between the eyes, causing it to fall to the ground, senseless.
From Pebble to Boulder.requirement: You must be wielding a sling.
From Pebble to Boulder.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Killer's Gift.name: Killer's Gift
Killer's Gift.flavor: Your brutal attack sends your enemy staggering away from you.
Killer's Gift.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Killer's Gift.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Killer's Gift.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Killer's Gift.cunningSneak: The number of squares you slide the target equals your Intelligence modifier.

Perfect Sniper.name: Perfect Sniper
Perfect Sniper.flavor: From the darkness, you carefully aim your shot and fire. Your foe glances around, but you’re too well hidden for it to spot you.
Perfect Sniper.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Perfect Sniper.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Perfect Sniper.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. If you have superior cover or total concealment, you remain hidden after the attack.
Perfect Sniper.cunningSneak: You remain hidden after the attack if you have any cover or any concealment.

Sheathe the Blade.name: Sheathe the Blade
Sheathe the Blade.flavor: You sheathe your weapon in your foe’s flesh and then shove it away for your allies to finish off.
Sheathe the Blade.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Sheathe the Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target gains vulnerable 10 to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Killing Storm.name: Killing Storm
Killing Storm.flavor: Your attacks rain down upon unsuspecting enemies, planting terror among your foes’ ranks.
Killing Storm.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow or a sling.
Killing Storm.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Killing Storm.onHit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target moves its speed away from the burst’s origin square. The target grants combat advantage (save ends).

Kiss of Death.name: Kiss of Death
Kiss of Death.flavor: You promise death to a nearby foe. Then you take advantage of your allies’ attacks to deliver it.
Kiss of Death.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Kiss of Death.effect: Choose one creature adjacent to you. Until the stance ends, whenever the chosen creature is adjacent to you and takes damage from a melee or a ranged attack while you are wielding a light blade, you can make a melee basic attack against it as an opportunity action. In addition, your basic attacks against the target gain the rattling keyword.

Steel Nettle Rain.name: Steel Nettle Rain
Steel Nettle Rain.flavor: You dance deftly around your foe and deliver an attack that is like a thousand metal nettles against its flesh.
Steel Nettle Rain.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Steel Nettle Rain.effect: Before and after the attack, you move your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from the target.

Throat Cut.name: Throat Cut
Throat Cut.flavor: You come out of hiding to inflict a fatal wound on your foe.
Throat Cut.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Throat Cut.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Throat Cut.onHit: 5[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends).
Throat Cut.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Treachery's Reward.name: Treachery's Reward
Treachery's Reward.flavor: You throw out the notion of a fair fight when you launch a devastating attack from your hiding place.
Treachery's Reward.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Treachery's Reward.attack: Dexterity vs. AC. You can make two attack rolls and use the higher result if you are hidden from the target before the attack. In addition, if you are hidden and have superior cover or total concealment when you attack, you remain hidden after the attack.

Anticipate Attack (Rogue).name: Anticipate Attack (Rogue)
Anticipate Attack (Rogue).flavor: You sense the attack before it comes.
Anticipate Attack (Rogue).trigger: You are hit by an attack.
Anticipate Attack (Rogue).requirement: You must be trained in Insight.
Anticipate Attack (Rogue).effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Marked Escape.name: Marked Escape
Marked Escape.flavor: Through your subtlety, you end your enemy's mark.
Marked Escape.effect: The marked condition ends on you.

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.flavor: You take a split second to locate the most vulnerable point in your enemy’s defenses.
Backstab.trigger: You make an attack roll against an enemy within 5 squares of you using a basic attack with a weapon. The enemy must be granting combat advantage to you.
Backstab.effect:
You gain a +3 power bonus to the attack roll, and the enemy takes 1d6 extra damage if the attack hits.
Level 7: 2d6 extra damage.
Level 17: 3d6 extra damage.
Level 27: 4d6 extra damage.

Acrobat's Trick.name: Acrobat's Trick
Acrobat's Trick.flavor: For a brief moment, you move along a wall. The momentum you build translates into a more powerful attack.
Acrobat's Trick.effect:
You move up to your speed -2. During this move, you have a climb speed equal to your speed -2. You also gain a +2 power bonus to your next damage roll with a basic attack during this turn.
Level 11: +4 power bonus.
Level 21: +6 power bonus.

Ambush Trick.name: Ambush Trick
Ambush Trick.flavor: You dodge and weave, making a feint that causes your foe to turn and lose track of you.
Ambush Trick.effect: You move up to your speed. Until the end of your turn, you gain combat advantage against enemies that are within 5 squares of you when you attack and that have none of their allies adjacent to them.

Escape Artist's Trick.name: Escape Artist's Trick
Escape Artist's Trick.flavor: You slip forward to engage your enemy, then spring back and out of its grasp after delivering an attack.
Escape Artist's Trick.effect: You shift up to 2 squares. Once at the end of this turn, you can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Feinting Trick.name: Feinting Trick
Feinting Trick.flavor: You slash in one direction, but quickly change the angle of your attack. While your foe reacts to your first move, your true attack slips past its defenses.
Feinting Trick.effect: You move up to your speed. You gain a power bonus to the next damage roll you make this turn with a basic attack for which you do not have combat advantage. The power bonus equals your Charisma modifier.

Sneak's Trick.name: Sneak's Trick
Sneak's Trick.flavor: You fade into the shadows, moving with such precision that you can hide in even the barest scrap of cover.
Sneak's Trick.effect: You move up to your speed -2. At the end of this move, you can make a Stealth check to hide if you have any cover or concealment.

Tactical Trick.name: Tactical Trick
Tactical Trick.flavor: Your quick assessment of the battlefield shows you both where to step and which enemies are too distracted to defend themselves properly.
Tactical Trick.effect: You move up to your speed, and you do not provoke opportunity attacks when leaving squares adjacent to your allies. Until the end of your turn, you have combat advantage against enemies that have at least one of your allies adjacent to them.

Thug's Trick.name: Thug's Trick
Thug's Trick.flavor: With your enemy hemmed in, you keep your blade ready to punish it for any move it makes.
Thug's Trick.effect: You can shift 1 square. Until the end of your next turn, enemies you flank provoke opportunity attacks from you if they shift.

Tumbling Trick.name: Tumbling Trick
Tumbling Trick.flavor: You dodge between your foes, slashing to the right and left with such speed that one attack leads into another.
Tumbling Trick.effect: You shift up to 3 squares. The next time you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack this turn, you also deal damage equal to your Strength modifier to a different enemy, which must be adjacent to you.

Unbalancing Trick.name: Unbalancing Trick
Unbalancing Trick.flavor: You dodge low as you approach an enemy, protecting yourself from attack and setting up a strike to the knee or lower leg.
Unbalancing Trick.effect: You shift up to 2 squares. The next time you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack this turn, you can knock it prone.

Sudden Leap.name: Sudden Leap
Sudden Leap.flavor: You jump from a standing position, surprising your foes.
Sudden Leap.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Sudden Leap.effect: You jump a number of squares up to half your speed.

Cunning Escape.name: Cunning Escape
Cunning Escape.flavor: As your enemy attacks, you leap aside to make your escape.
Cunning Escape.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy’s attack. At the end of the triggering enemy’s turn, you can also shift up to 3 squares as a free action.

Slip Aside.name: Slip Aside
Slip Aside.flavor: You distract a foe to diminish the effect of an attack.
Slip Aside.prerequisite: You must have training in Stealth.
Slip Aside.trigger: You are hit by an attack against your AC or Reflex.
Slip Aside.effect: You take only half damage from the triggering attack.

Acrobat's Escape.name: Acrobat's Escape
Acrobat's Escape.flavor: As an enemy tries to move close, you slip away and leave the approaching foe off balance.
Acrobat's Escape.prerequisite: You must have training in Acrobatics.
Acrobat's Escape.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you.
Acrobat's Escape.effect: The target is immobilized until the start of its next turn. You then shift a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier to a square that is not adjacent to the target.

Counter-Step.name: Counter-Step
Counter-Step.flavor: As your foe bears down on you, you use its momentum to maneuver it into position for your counterattack.
Counter-Step.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Counter-Step.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you.
Counter-Step.effect: You can slide the target 1 square. You then shift up to 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target. You gain combat advantage and a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the target until the end of your next turn.

Nimble Fingers.name: Nimble Fingers
Nimble Fingers.flavor: You can snatch or stow an enemy’s possessions even in the heat of combat.
Nimble Fingers.prerequisite: You must have training in Thievery.
Nimble Fingers.effect: You draw one weapon that is sheathed or worn (but not held) by the target, stow a single item on the target, or retrieve a single item the target has stowed. If you are hidden from the target, the target is not aware that you have used this power.

Slip from the Grasp.name: Slip from the Grasp
Slip from the Grasp.flavor: As a master thief, no chains can hold you, no enemy can corner you. You always have one last gambit.
Slip from the Grasp.effect: If you are grabbed, the grab ends. If you are subject to an effect that is slowing or immobilizing you, the effect ends. You can also make a saving throw against an effect you are subject to that a save can end.

Invisible Stalker.name: Invisible Stalker
Invisible Stalker.flavor: You move with such grace that your foes cannot track you.
Invisible Stalker.effect: You become invisible and move up to your speed to a square that is not adjacent to any enemy. You become visible when the movement ends.

Palming Strike.name: Palming Strike
Palming Strike.flavor: You slash out with one hand while the other reaches into your pack to grab exactly what you need.
Palming Strike.prerequisite: You must be trained in Thievery
Palming Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Palming Strike.effect: You may draw a single item from a bag or pouch as a free action.

Killing Shadow.name: Killing Shadow
Killing Shadow.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Killing Shadow.flavor: Springing out from hiding, you deliver a swift attack and move away before your enemy can figure out what just happened.
Killing Shadow.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow, a light blade, or a sling.
Killing Shadow.target: One creature from which you are hidden
Killing Shadow.effect: The attack doesn’t cause you to stop being hidden, and you can move up to your speed as a free action.

Tight Squeeze.name: Tight Squeeze
Tight Squeeze.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Tight Squeeze.flavor: With a daring movement, you strike your foe and trick it into a narrow space.
Tight Squeeze.special: If you’re squeezing when you use this power, you don’t take the penalty to the attack roll from squeezing.
Tight Squeeze.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you swap places with the target if possible, forcing it to squeeze if necessary. You then shift up to half your speed.

Startling Offensive.name: Startling Offensive
Startling Offensive.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Startling Offensive.flavor: You strike before your foe even realizes that you are a threat.
Startling Offensive.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Startling Offensive.trigger: An enemy enters a square within 3 squares of you.
Startling Offensive.effect: You shift up to 2 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy and make the following attack with combat advantage.
Startling Offensive.onHit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
